room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Loveeeedddd it! Something different to do rather then your typical friday night of movies, deffinently coming back for the other rooms! Soo much adrenaline & excitement !

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: What an awesome experience. If you're looking for an exciting, riveting, and challenging experience, BREAKOUT is right for you. My girlfriend and I went on a double date with some friends, and it was incredible. I highly recommend it, and I will definitely be back soon! Ps: I challenge you to beat our time from "The Kidnapping": 52:45!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Great experience. One of the best escape room experiences I've had so far. Our game maker, Ben made it an even more enjoyable experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Amazing fun!!! Will so be back! It was great having everybody work together and laughing the entire time

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was awesome!!! I would definitely be doing this again! So much fun

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We were there yesterday to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday with our friends. Our group was of six people, and it was our very first go at a breakout game. It couldn't have been more fun!! The fabulous set-up - the scene, clues, and even some very surprising "special effects" make it an engrossing and fast-paced experience, and the clever puzzles keep you engaged the whole time. The staff is extremely friendly, and you can tell that they have just as much fun setting things up as we do playing it. We are definitely hooked and will most certainly go back for more!! Thanks Breakout Atlanta for an exciting evening!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Had a blast at Breakout Atlanta! Challenging, fun and fantastic staff!!! Our game master was awesome!!
